Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Material': 'Emery', 'Brand': 'Sylvia Lashes', 'Unit Count': '20.0 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 5.43 x 0.83 inches; 5.19 Ounces', 'UPC': '794020365385', 'Manufacturer': 'Okk Express'}
Review Text: Perfect condition, the monomer has the same scent as my other same brand and same color so I do believe It is authentic Mia Secret and I love this monomer. The files were a really nice additional gift too! Great buy, very happy.
Review Title: Legitimate monomer!

reference_summary:
JARGOD 1pcs 100% Kolinsky Sable Acrylic Nails Round Nail Art Brush (size 4)
JARGOD
{'Brand': 'JARGOD', 'Handle Material': 'Acrylic', 'Head Material': 'Kolinsky', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 0.3 x 0.3 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Minimal shedding, perfect shape! Just wish I had got a bigger one!! This is good for fills and nail art though!!
Licensed tech GOOD BRUSH
Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Keiby Citom
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
As a licensed Cosmetologist I've used ALOT of files and this shape is the best for when I so nail enhancements because I can get into the cuticle area and ensure it is smooth perfectly with the round side and then the straight side is good for filing the sides and shaping the nails! These are good quality and exactly as I expected!!
Best shape for nail files!!
1000 Pcs Acrylic Nail Kit, Coffin Nails Long Fake Nails Tips For Nail Salons And DIY Nail, Artificial Half Cover Nail Tips With Box, Nature & Clear, 10 Size
VEAFX
{'Color': 'Clear', 'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'VEAFX', 'Style': 'French', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 7 x 1.4 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '782912939134'}
All nail tips are the same just make sure you blend the seam And remove the shine too. Get the job done and come in bulk so they're perfect for me!
Medium depth nail well, No issues, good buy- Cosmetologist
Fashion Line 24nch Long Straight Clip In Hair Extension Full Head 7pcs/set 20Clips Heat Resistant Thick Synthetic Hairpiece Clip On Hair Extensions Dark Brown Color
FASHION LINE
{'Brand': 'FASHION LINE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Clip-In', 'Package Dimensions': '14.22 x 4.89 x 0.91 inches; 6.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '193499624007'}
BEAUTIFUL and look so real!! I absolutely adore these!! Perfect thickness, length color and texture!! I hate that I have to color my hair and these won't match but I'm going to just buy another pair !!
Love these so cute
lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl
lootaan
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'}
Sturdy tips on the thicker side but not obnoxiously thick they're perfect! I'm a nail tech (Licensed) and have used MANY different nail tips in my lifetime and never have I ever had a nail container have an actual slot for nail glue to be stored with them!! This is so smart and all of them should be like this! I will keep this container long after the tips are all used up lol!!
10 stars!!! Sturdy not bulky tips, CONTAINER HAS SLOT FOR GLUE TO BE STORED!!
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
pine
{'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'}
These colors are so much more vibrant than they look online for sure! They are just like breathtaking the shimmer in them is so  pretty I absolutely adore these polishes I cannot wait to get to use them on my nails and in the salon! I was surprised they were so bright when I opened the bottles! It also came with instructions too if you've never used gel polish too! Just make sure you have a UV lamp to cure these (=
SO PRETTY AND SUPER VIBRANT
Yolife Acrylic Nail Brush with100% Pure Kolinsky Sable, Nail Art Brush With Brilliant crystal Handle, for Manicure Pedicure (6#, Silver)
YOLIFE
{'Color': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'YOLIFE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.75 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
This is some work I did with the brushes! The acrylic brush is perfect for doing french tips with acrylic and the brushes are perfect for art. I have a ton of art brushes I use as you can see and these ones are not only the cutest but the best quality. All my brushes are from amazon and very in price but these are so much nicer! A must have for holidays (= We need good quality tools like these for good nails!!
Cosmetologist review!
Bicrops Professional Haircutting Shears Kit, Stainless Steel Beard Hairdressing Scissors Set, Regular Hair Shear, Thinning Scissor, Leather Case. Home Hair Salon For Men And Women
Bicrops
{'Material': 'Stainless Steel, Leather', 'Brand': 'Bicrops', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Style': 'Classic', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '9.61 x 4.53 x 1.34 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '779324784056', 'Manufacturer': 'Bicrops'}
First of all this case is nice and worth the listed price on it's own! I have like 15 pairs of scissors and they're all dull so I figured I'd give these a try! I'm soo glad I did, I have nothing I dislike or don't love and I always have something I dislike usually lol. These have cute little blue gems and are really sharp and do a great job they're comfortable for my little hands and my chubby fingers! So excited to use them at work tommorrow!!! They have a nice weight to them I would expect to pay like $50+ for these atleast so I am blown away. I'm so glad I chose these!!
Good buy- Licensed pro going on 11 years!
RXBC2011 100 Eyelash Extensions Aftercare instructions Card Diamond Design 2 x 3.5 in
RXBC2011
{'Brand': 'RXBC2011', 'Material': 'Paper', 'Item Form': 'Individual', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Item Weight': '4.5 Ounces'}
My only complaint is that they're kinda matte and not shiney in texture/look. They are super cute and all the information on the cards is correct which is why I wanted these. Customers have to know what to not do to ensure their lashes last so these are a perfect little reminder for them!
Good info perfect to hand out!
LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools
LXIANGN
{}
It is maybe 2 inches around in size small but perfect for monomer and powder to do nails! My sister saw these and loved them and wanted them for earrings which would be a great idea too!! The color isn't inside but underneath so if you put monomer in them it won't discolor it! These are great! I am so happy with them and highly recommend these for nail tech use! I used a little pipette to fill them with powder and liquid.
Nail tech use, perfect for me!!
French Smile Line Cutter Kit 8 Pieces, Nail Manicure Edge Trimmer Diy Plate Module with 2 Nail French Tip Brushes for DIY Acrylic Nail Art, Stainless Steel Easy French Smile Line Gel Cutter Tool
BQAN
{'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 4.13 x 1.1 inches; 2.79 Ounces'}
I just had bought a 2 piece set and for my short/medium length nails they didn't work 😬 I was so sad untill I saw these! I love the variety of shapes and shapes for a variety of nail lengths! It's hard to explain but like some of the nail cutters are made only for long/xl nail shapes for a deep french tip. These will work with short nails medium large and xl nails too. They're just perfect I love these so much and cannot wait to try them!! There is one very unique shape I've never done or seen used before so that's really neat and I cannot wait!!!
Great variety for different length nails!
LUXEDIVA Brazilian Virgin Hair Straight 3 Bundles 10A Unprocessed Brazilian Short Straight Human Hair Weave Weft Natural Black 14 16 18
LUXEDIVA
{'Brand': 'LUXEDIVA', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '11.02 x 10.91 x 2.68 inches; 12.31 Ounces'}
The hair is a very nice quality and it is the length expected but it is so thin and the tracks are so bulky. I'm so bummed they're so thin because my hair is so thick. They are all 3 individually wrapped bundles and tell you the length on them. The track part is super thick but the very ends just thin out sooo much. I guess that is how natural hair is so I will give it a try. I'm going to do a hand tied weft and will update after I wear them and let you guys know how they dry too. I have naturally curly hair so I always prefer hair that dried kinda wavy like my own and nobody ever says in the reviews that and I'm sure other people wanted to know too!
Nice but thin
Mia Secret Monomer 8oz + Black Nail File Emery Boards Top-quality (100/180 Grit) - 5Pack
Sylvia Lashes

Legitimate monomer!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Passion for Nail Art, Hair, and Beauty**: The user is a licensed technician committed to nail art and growing their expertise in hair extensions and beauty aesthetics. They enjoy discovering innovative products for creative expression, particularly in hair.

- **Commitment to Quality**: This user consistently seeks high-quality tools and materials, evidenced by their recent purchases, indicating a preference for reliable performance and outstanding value. They appreciate items that meet or exceed expectations in their beauty toolkit.

- **Size and Shape Preference**: The user favors tools with flexible dimensions for precise enhancements across different applications, including hair. They value functional containers and tools designed for various hair textures and lengths.

- **Performance and Versatility**: Their recent experiences emphasize a dedication to performance in beauty products, with an eye for versatility that integrates seamlessly into their routine. They actively explore diverse supplies for creative outcomes.

- **Positive Experiences with Nail Products**: The user's recent interactions reflect a positive assessment of nail products, especially preferring authentic brands and appreciating thoughtful additions in their purchases. They remain open to experimenting with hair extensions while still prioritizing quality, especially concerning their naturally curly hair.

Overall, the user is a discerning beauty professional focused on innovation, quality, and versatility, seeking effective solutions that enhance both their professional practice and personal aesthetic endeavors.
